FuncDef: The reset web statistics packet command clears statistics on the packets exchanged between a web authentication server and the device.
CLIs: reset web statistics packet [ ip-address <ipv4-address> [ vpn-instance <string-value> ] ]
reset web statistics packet [ ipv6-address <ipv6-address> [ vpn-instance <string-value> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the IP address of a web authentication server.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies a VPN instance name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Specifies IPv6 address.
The value is a 32-digit hexadecimal number, in the format of X:X:X:X:X:X:X:X.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Before collecting statistics on the packets exchanged between a web authentication server and the NE40E over a specified period, run the reset web statistics packet command to clear the existing statistics.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
